## FormDataRequestOptions type

Request options for fetch (RequestInit)

**Signature:**

```typescript
type FormDataRequestOptions = {
    maxContentLength?: number;
    maxBodyLength?: number;
    withCredentials?: boolean;
    headers?: FormDataPostHeaders;
    [key: string]: any;
};
```
